items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Easily upload your photo using drag-and-drop or file browsing. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Outpainting
items.description: Our advanced AI intelligently analyzes your image, fills in gaps, and extends scenes while maintaining a natural look.

items.title: Download Your Enhanced Photo
items.description: Preview enhancements with our comparison slider and download your transformed image in high quality.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users who enhance their photos with AI Outpainting

items.name: Emily Clark
items.comment: AI Outpainting took my travel photos to the next level! The backgrounds look incredibly natural.

items.name: John Smith
items.comment: As a designer, I find AI Outpainting invaluable for creating captivating visuals. It saves me so much time!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about AI Outpainting

items.title: What can AI Outpainting do?
items.description: AI Outpainting excels at extending backgrounds, filling in gaps, and enhancing any area of your image with a cohesive and natural appearance.

items.title: Is there a limit on enhancements?
items.description: You can use outpainting features on numerous images daily, making it perfect for both casual users and professionals.

items.title: Can I use my enhanced images commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users with subscriptions can use enhanced content for commercial purposes. Free users may use it for personal projects.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: All processing occurs in your browser, ensuring your images never leave your device and maintaining full privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Images?
footer.description: Try AI Outpainting today and experience the magic for yourself. No sign-up required.
